alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau; Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 1:30PM AKST until January 15 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...LONG DURATION SNOW EVENT FOR THIS WEEKEND... .Snow has been ongoing across the northern panhandle since Friday night with snow accumulations of around 6 to 13 inches reported across the area as of Saturday morning. Snow has been very fluffy with snow ratios upwards of 40 to 50 to one in the northern inner channels. Snowfall rates expected to gradually increase in intensity through the weekend, and may become wetter and heavier as temperatures warm. Some areas near the outer coast may see rain start to mix in by Sun night and Monday. ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 22 to 29 inches. Snowfall rates of 0.75 to 1.5 inches per hour are possible at times. * WHERE...Glacier Bay and City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult and is discourage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light dry snow will accumulate quickly and may become wetter and heavier Sunday into Monday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Juneau; Glacier Bay
